title: Configuración y Parámetros Web
prompt:
Create a web configuration and settings page for the 'Cierre de Cajas' application. It should feature a sidebar navigation consistent with {{DATA:SCREEN:SCREEN_9}} and {{DATA:SCREEN:SCREEN_10}}. The main content area should include: 
1. UI Adjustments: A toggle for Dark/Light mode and a primary color selector (showing the neon green as active).
2. Admin Management: A section to define or change the 'Socio Administrador/Gerente' with a profile-style card.
3. Simulation Tools: A 'Lote de Prueba' section with buttons to 'Generar lote de datos ficticios' and 'Borrado automático'.
4. Business Rules: Configuration inputs for 'Días máximos permitidos para carga hacia atrás' and a toggle for 'Obligatoriedad de motivos en correcciones'.
Style: Dark mode, rounded corners (20px), modern clean interface, neon green accents (#38ff14), professional dashboard aesthetic. Use the theme {{DATA:THEME:THEME_4}}.
